//: Appears in the refugee center as shopkeeper with missions.  Faction critical.

dynamic_line.yes: Do you want anything from me? I'm a bit busy being at the moment.
dynamic_line.no: Do you want anything from me? I'm a bit busy being at the moment.

responses.text: What is it like being a cook in this station?
Do you have a task for me?
Goodbye, thank you for your time.

dynamic_line.yes: It's awful, I was the one stuck with kitchen duty around here when I barely even know how to cook. I guess that's what a lack of seniority gets you, even after the cataclysm.
dynamic_line.no: It's awful, I was the one stuck with kitchen duty around here when I barely even know how to cook. I guess that's what a lack of seniority gets you, even after the cataclysm.

dialogue.describe: So, it's a bit of a funny story. Our little base uses a set of water purifiers in order to get potable water. There's an order we were always given, NEVER bring the purifiers outside the base. Unfortuantely, I was a bit lazy and decided to bring the purifier to a local pond rather than bear the brunt of hauling water back and forth. Needless to say, I was attacked on the way back to our base. Can you get the purifier back for me?

dialogue.accepted: Thanks for accepting my offer, but can you please lay low about it?
dialogue.rejected: Why ask about a task and then reject it?
dialogue.advice: Be careful, Newts can be pretty hard to shoot, don't underestimate them.
dialogue.inquire: Have you found the part yet?
dialogue.success: Great work, I might have more tasks for you in the future
dialogue.success_lie: That's odd, I don't really know what to say.
dialogue.failure: Oh well, at least you tried. That's more than what most people do around here.

dialogue.describe: I have some bad news, I was trying to scavenge some food from a nearby Dawson family restaurant. Of course, being me, I made another terrible mistake. Suffice it to say that there's now a group of angry robots moving to our base. Deal with them for me and I'll give you some good grub to eat.
